website_summaries.verdict: A gently curved headboard makes this solid wood bed a classy option.
pros: This bed is well worth the price, and it looks lovely when assembled
The cherry veneer is attractive and rich, and the mahogany wood underneath is sturdy
Assembly is straightforward with all necessary tools included
cons: Some customers report that their beds came with dings and scratches, and the wooden parts may not fit together perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy!
customer_reviews.text: This Is the first time ever buying a bed online without seeing it in person. We searched for a long time and was happy to find one made of mahogany, like our previous queen bed was. It is a Beautiful bed! I also love how it can be taken apart if we need to move it again. It was packed extremely well with no damage to be seen. The wrench to tighten down the side rails didn't last too long though...as it bends. It took me about 2 hours to unpack and setup. We also purchased a steel box spring that is 9 inches and it fit perfectly and ends right before the top of the side rails.
customer_reviews.author: Marcellino B.

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful bed, very sturdy and well made. It looks much more expensive than it was
customer_reviews.text: It took me just 3 hours by myself from the time I opened the boxes, to the time I was able to go to sleep! It's a beautiful bed, very sturdy and well made. It looks much more expensive than it was. I would recommend it to anyone! There is a gap between the end of the mattress and the footboard, but it doesn't bother me because I have a very thick comforter that hides it. I think it's done that way to accommodate either a king or a CA king mattress.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBriDavis

customer_reviews.title: Started to fall apart after 4 years, collapsed at 5.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted exactly 5 years, then collapsed. I weigh 200#, my partner far less. The greatest load bearing happens at the join between the headboard and the sideboards. Unfortunately the sideboards are made of particleboard and the headboard bolts on the right side ripped right through the thinnest sidewall that contains them inside the sideboard. In the previous 12 months the supports under the mattress had simply fallen out, weakening the load bearing in the slats, but I had replaced them with carefully-leveled stacks of books that provided better support. While this was inexpensive for a sleigh-like bed, 5 years is not a reasonable life.
customer_reviews.author: M. Daguerre

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: The bed came in three boxes and all hardware was included. I ended up using my own Allen wrench and socket wrenches to save time but you could get it done with what they give you. The wood is gorgeous (and smells great!). It was pretty straightforward to assemble. I did notice a tiny nick in the headboard but I will probably just color it in with a wood pen. The frame is quite large and the bed sits high but it's fun to climb in and out of. Overall very happy with the purchase and glad to have an option other than the local furniture store where the frames were $200-400 more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Black

customer_reviews.title: Great bed once assembled
customer_reviews.text: This bed looks amazing when all put together. Not all of the pieces fit correctly (ie one of the support pieces was too long) but we were able to make it work. Once completed, it is nicely built and sturdy. It looks like a more expensive bed than it is. Costco has a very similar looking bed for 3x the cost. Although it was a pain to put it together, we are happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed/poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this bed frame, however I gave it a 4 because the headboard arrived cracked. They sent us a new one right away, but that box came all ripped up and banged up as the other one. Thankfully there was no damage to the new headboard. I think they just need to use a different service to deliver their product since I have seen the same problem in previous reviews. Otherwise I love, love, love this bed. It is well built and very sharp looking without being huge and bulky
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was the Best Buy of the year for me. I was worried because it's a large expensive item so much could go wrong, but alas! It arrived on time, it beautiful solid wood, easy to assemble, and looks just like the picture. Great Quality for the price. I'm never going to a furniture store again
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: Stunning bed! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful bed! So well made and looks and feels like I spent much more than I did. Highly recommended! Only took me 90 minutes to put together on my own (not including unpacking) as the instructions were short and simple and not overly complicated like some can be. I still can't believe the quality of it for the price I paid. I love this bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! For the price...this quality bed is a steal! We have had it for almost two years and it is wonderful. It doesn’t make any noises even with just me putting it together (I did elicit help to hold up parts of frame so I could assemble correctly). It took several hours but again, I assembled by myself. I would gladly recommend this bed frame to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed, solid cherry
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed--solid cherry wood. While you do have to do a fair bit of assembly (it took my husband about 3 hours to put together by himself), when you are finished, it's a good, solid, really nice piece of furniture. The directions were also clear, so even though there were a lot of steps, it was not a frustrating job, and the bed looks as though it will last forever. It looks like a bed that would cost about 3x its price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Fabulous bed. Solid wood and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived 5 days earlier than expected (which would have been wonderful... had we closed on the house it was being delivered too!). We built it in a couple of hours, its complete hardwood, wonderfully solid and beautiful. It was easy to put together and is sturdy. Instructions were good. Tools were adequate for the job as supplied. This was simply an absolute bargain and we are extremely pleased. Note a Box spring (lower height) is essential.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually never write reviews and I NEVER buy something this expensive online without seeing it in person first. I took a huge chance on this bed and it is PERFECT!!!! It is a beautiful, solid bed and matches my other bedroom furniture as I had hoped. No scratches, shipping was quick and this was the lowest price I found. I won't get in a habit of making such large purchases online but this was a definite win!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect in our master bedroom and looks very elegant and ...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who has seen this loves our bed. It is perfect in our master bedroom and looks very elegant and much more expensive than it was. I have very expensive and elegant taste in furniture and this is beautiful. My mother liked it so much she even got a queen version of this (she has very extravagant and expensive furniture). A great purchase. More than one person is definitely needed to put this together. It will take awhile, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: penngal03

customer_reviews.title: It is a pretty and big bed,but~~~
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty and big bed. However, there are only 3 wooden slats to support the foundation and mattress, and they are light weight. I don't know how long they could support us even though we are not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: We love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, beautiful finish, beautiful, sturdy bed!! We had a Casper mattress and frame, and were able to alter the Casper frame just enough to fit perfectly inside the Lafayette bed’s frame. It looks gorgeous! We love our bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!  It’s beautiful, strong and easy to get together!
customer_reviews.text: Superb looking, quality bed. The only tricky bit of assembly was adding the side rails, where I needed another person to hold the other end, otherwise managed to do it allow. Took about an hour. I cannot recommend this highly enough. I purchased the king size.
customer_reviews.author: Joe's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great bed.
customer_reviews.text: The bed is gorgeous. The headboard arrived broken and I contacted the company and they sent out a new headboard right away at no cost and I did not have to return the broken one. Pretty easy to put together. I did it with my sister and its great.
customer_reviews.author: ReJENt Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap assembly hardware but nice bed overall
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed but the assembly hardware is cheap and weak. While this bed looks great, the hardware included is better suited for a Walmart purchase. My old bed used heavy-duty post and hook assembly. I was expecting that here but was disappointed to see cheap c-clips and white metal. In fact, one of the cheap c-clips cracked in half while assembling the bed. That stinks...
customer_reviews.author: P. K.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bed great quality, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This bed exceeded our expectations. My husband and I are amazed at the quality and the look of this bed, we couldn't be happier, our bedroom is gorgeous with this bed. The shipping was quick and it was packaged perfectly. With my help, my husband put this bed together in less than 2 hours. We are pleased with this purchase to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Britton

customer_reviews.title: Very "high-end" quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Pieces arrived separately so I thought something was missing. Customer service (phone number on box) reached a person here in US and she was very nice and very helpful telling us to wait to wait a few days, but if it did not arrive to call back. (Other piece arrived next day.) The bed is beautiful, very well made and easy to put together. High-end quality.
customer_reviews.author: kbff

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful and fairly straightforward to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and fairly straightforward to assemble. Set it up in a place where you'll never move it and you should be okay. I tried to move this bed to the opposite wall and many of the support legs and one of the bed feet broke. We pieced it back together, but I'll never try to re-arrange it again without removing the mattress and disassembling
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: The most beautiful bed
customer_reviews.text: I was searching around for a bed and couldn't find one that I liked, until I found this one. This bed is BEAUTIFUL!!!! It's so sturdy and the finish is so pretty. It didn't take my husband long to set it up so that's a huge plus. It's heavy and such good quality. If you're looking for a bed, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: LaceyLee

customer_reviews.title: Great frame
customer_reviews.text: Great bed frame. Very sturdy and good solid pieces of wood. Easy to put together. It was a tad longer than a normal king...so maybe Cali King? But it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Boomslang1982

customer_reviews.title: Amazing craftsmanship. Beautiful. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, east to install. High high quality, the wood is a perfect color. A could nicks and scratches but nothing thay can be noticed. Installed it by myself and it only took about 1 1/2 hours. This is firm, and again! Beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Baddley

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy, quality product.
customer_reviews.text: When I put this bed together I didn't realize how easy it was. The wood is a very good quality and once I put the bed together it was incredibly sturdy. My only complaint would be that the corners of the bed towards where your feet play are sharp. You should be careful when rounding corners. I can't tell you how many times I've nicked my leg. I would recommend putting some kind of gel or cover around the foot of the bed corners. Other than that it's a great product. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Siek

customer_reviews.title: Never leaving my room again lol
customer_reviews.text: We are in love with this bed! Its sturdy and very classy. We needed to upgrade to a king after getting an amazing deal on a gel mattress and this bed is awesome. Hubby put it together by himself in a couple of hours, no creeks or wiggles!
customer_reviews.author: #IslandGyal

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy , looks great. I'm happy with the purchase. Shipping prompt and well packaged. Multiple boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: This is one heavy duty bed, great bed.
customer_reviews.text: Took us about three hours to put together, the two of us, very well made and everything went together perfectly, love the bed, I am very happy with it, my first new bed in over 25 years so I am excited.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Batorski

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled with the quality and look of this bed. Very well packed and no damage from shipping. All pieces were well labeled and no pieces missing. Bed is very comfortable. Don’t think would be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SRC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Had a big hole in the headboard, inspect it as soon as it arrives...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great for a price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for price, looks great, but product came damaged same spot on each side like something went through it. Waiting on call back from company to see about getting replaced. Over all I’m pleased just hope they can resend the footboard with out any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: amwilson

customer_reviews.title: overall looks nice, and will last hopefully for years to come
customer_reviews.text: headboard came with a huge gouge out of it. Headboard wood isnt as solid in the panels as I thought it would be, overall looks nice, and will last hopefully for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Adk Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: Just use caution because the end corners protrude and I’ve whacked my knees on them when walking past.
customer_reviews.author: E K

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy bed for a very reasonable price. Had someone through amazon come to the house to assemble it and they did a great job. Neat and considerate. Well worth the additional cost for no aggravation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A furniture purchase with value!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is a very nice piece of furniture! It goes together very well. The quality is high and the price beats anything I found shopping at the various furniture stores. It is well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: tcouchgt3rs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous buying a large piece of furniture online, but I'm so glad I did. I had shopped around locally and found a bed I liked but it was $300 dollars more, was going to take 10 days to come from their warehouse and I was going to have to pay $100 for delivery!!, Amazon had them beat all around! This bed is a beautiful, rich dark brown wood and good quality. It came in 3 large boxes and my husband had no issues in assembling it. I'm really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Quality is superior
customer_reviews.text: Never bought a item this big on line. Arrived promptly and undamaged. Rather easy to assemble with MY tools. Once put up very sturdy and great looking piece. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: RTC5960

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed
customer_reviews.text: The bed is absolutely gorgeous and it was easy to put together. I was a little nervous about ordering a new bed frame through Amazon, but once it was received we were very satisfied. The price was great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful dark cherry and its not MDF or pressed wood
customer_reviews.text: Solid and heavy bed. The pictures do not do it justice. beautiful dark cherry and its not MDF or pressed wood. This is a quality piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: michael w. flint

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is absolutely beautiful and very well made for the price! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: heather johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's large and sturdy!! Color is rich and true to picture
customer_reviews.text: This bed is quality!! It's large and sturdy!! Color is rich and true to picture. I feel like the bed is way larger than the image indicates... But I liked it! Great price for the product as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly N.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many beds, this bed is beautiful, sturdy and high quality. There was a little challenge setting it up by myself but well worth it. I highly recommend it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: albert mills

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We look all over for a bed that would match our set. We were upgrading to a king size . this was perfect. easy assembly and beautiful. very happy with purchase. Price was much less than we saw in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Seffens

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is beautiful and stylish, my husband and I put the bed together (requires two people) because there are a lot of screws to put in. Great buy would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Arrived in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Arrived in 2 days. Perfect condition. Easy to assemble. Nice quality, real wood. Looks just like pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny O

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We received our bed in just two days. Everything was packaged very well and we had no damage. I was thrilled with the craftsmanship of this bed. It matched my existing cherry furniture exactly! It was simple and straightforward to assemble and it extremely well built. I would definitely recommend this bed to others.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Carter

customer_reviews.title: The product was fine. However
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine. However, the installation was not. Installer cancelled the appointment and then changed the agreed upon time the next day. I put the bed together myself
customer_reviews.author: Brad Stanbery

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 2 days. Packed nicely with no scratches. Easy to assemble and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma x 2

customer_reviews.title: very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Best bed i have ever had. Easy to assemble, delivered in perfect conditions. Definitely recommend this product. And it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: elmm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Statement
customer_reviews.text: The bed is perfect. It is easy to make and it looks so nice in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Melita Boldin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bed. Looks fantastic and very well made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A. Schenck

customer_reviews.title: This bed is the best surprise we have had from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This bed is the best surprise we have had from Amazon. The quality rocks and it is a great deal. It does require some extensive assembly, but the instructions are great and everything fit together perfectly. In my opinion this is comparable in quality and aesthetics to beds that cost from a couple of thousand to ten thousand. No they didn't pay me-I got tired of looking in high dollar furniture stores in NC that didn't offer anything this cool for prices that make your head spin. The quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: Donna030

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. Exceeded my expectations since I bought it without trying it. The bed is sturdy and heavy. Look goid also
customer_reviews.author: LThree

customer_reviews.title: Put together very easily and quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! Put together very easily and quickly. Came in 3 different boxes, with lots of protective packaging. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cox

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful; well built!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed; exceeds my expectations! It’s heavy, well built; with a beautiful finish. I’m a 57 YO woman; I unboxed and assembled on my own; it was easy!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bed!!! I was a little worried about ordering a big item like this online but I am so happy with the quality of this bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodene J.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bed but could have been better in shipping and mechanics
customer_reviews.text: There were some dents on head board and foot board. Stretcher and leg assembly is not of good quality metal bracket from stretcher came out while tightening the leg. One of the screw assembly on foot board is free I.e. It does not tighten up.
customer_reviews.author: suyash

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Rich color
customer_reviews.text: Solid bed. Good quality. Rich color. Decent price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen N.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!  I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing! I love it. Everything is hardwood and very well made. The look of it is really nice too! I highly recommend this bed. I was so impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Allen H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!  LOVE!  LOVE!  LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A BEAUTIFUL BED! We absolutely LOVE it! It took my husband and me about an hour to get it all together; but all the instructions and everything necessary was there, although we used one of our screwdrivers instead of the small allen wrench provided. It looks just like the picture. We got the king size; and I love that the frame is so pretty that you don't want your comforter to hang over and cover it up! I can't say enough how pleased we are. It came very well packaged; and even though the outer box had some dings, the bed was just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JW in NM

customer_reviews.title: The bedframe is wonderful for the money
customer_reviews.text: The bedframe is wonderful for the money. I was a little concerned about headboard being cracked but I came in perfect :-) I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly matched my other cherry furniture! Excellent quality & exceptional value! My best purchase on Amazon! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ron vanvactor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this bed! Fits our independent sleep number bed. Way nicer than we could have hoped!
customer_reviews.author: stephen a lachance

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have a sex life
customer_reviews.text: This bed is beautiful, but it’s made of fake wood and it broke in 5 months. Contacted the manufacturer and they said the warranty is only for 3 days and only covers 4 parts. Not worth the money if you have a sex life at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this bed to anyone who like wood and is ...
customer_reviews.text: It took me more than one month of research before choosing this bed. I was agreeably surprised by the quality, the sturdiness and the beauty of this bed. I agree with other reviewers who said it looks far more expensive that it really is. I say Wow! For Amazon packaging. The bed has been shipped to Florida, then to the Caribbean in a shipping container and then transported home in trucks. Even one scratch has been seen. I only think Home Styles could use stronger wood in the panels. I would recommend this bed to anyone who like wood and is looking for a nice bed made with solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Though it took two shipping to get all the parts without damages, it was well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: CAME WITH ALOT OF DEEP SCRATCHES ON THE HEAD BOARD
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Vorderstrasse

customer_reviews.title: Love love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous bed!! Beautiful & elegant and the foot board is a great added style. Very heavy duty sturdy bed. Real wood!! And for around $600 for a king great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Mkelley

customer_reviews.title: otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: The rails screws are not match with the support.. otherwise great product
customer_reviews.author: AjithKumar R K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the bed and it was easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Talley

customer_reviews.title: The is a beautifully finished and designed bed
customer_reviews.text: The is a beautifully finished and designed bed. I am using it without the slats, to surround an adjustable split king base. Haven't decided yet if I need to use any of the slats to make it a little more stable and reduce any stress at the corners when it becomes necessary to move the bed (for cleaning underneath),
customer_reviews.author: Trekker01

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed
customer_reviews.text: I took 3 people to put together - 2 of us are very sick (disabled). Easy to put together, and it turned out beautiful - definitely met all of my expectations. Sturdy and beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Joiner

customer_reviews.title: But the bed is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Headboard was split down the left side. Getting the bed returned and then a new one shipped was a long process. But the bed is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Andrew Schnabel

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have used it for a week and feels like it will last
customer_reviews.author: Lance M. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Alot better quality than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Alot better quality than I thought it would be. Not sure how people say it takes 3 hours to put together. It took 10 mins to unpackage everything and about 20 mins to put it all together without any help.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Wade

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, solid bed, easy to assemble. We love this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bed material is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is good bed. My cautious assessment is that it could have come with storage in it. The bed space between sleigh part and frame is bit high. You would probably need a wedge to fill the gap as the pillows fall through. However the material is good.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: The Bed Frame looks and working great, however
customer_reviews.text: The Bed Frame looks and working great, however, with only 30 days in use, the mattress has faltered. It does not hold it's shape and now we have two noticeable indentations in the mattress which does not flatten back to it's original shape. We also purchased a mattress cover with the hopes it would help with the problem, but it has not. I am requesting a mattress replacement with a stiffer/harder mattress that will address and solve this problem. Please respond to my request and address this issue. Thank You Phillip
customer_reviews.author: PLB

customer_reviews.title: Great product need replacement parts, ASAP!
customer_reviews.text: Great Bed!!! Love it, Just in need of replacement bolts, I moved to a new city and they somehow were left behind can tried to purchase, but I don't see any online.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Brown

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good bed, but there were two areas that could of been stained better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Wasted Money
customer_reviews.text: Even though the bed is bigger than it looks in the picture but it is a beautiful bed. However, when it arrived, Headboard had scratches; one of the rails had a broken bed support, and one of stretchers was also broken. When I received it, I just put in my garage and didn’t open the boxes till now. Now, it’s too late to return and everything is broken and massy. Un-Happy!
customer_reviews.author: ABI.

product_meta.title: Lafayette Cherry King Sleigh Bed by Home Styles
product_meta.description: An opulence of design heightens the allure of the Lafayette bedroom collection. Lafayette King sleigh bed by Home Styles is inspired by ancestral traditional design. Mahogany solids with cherry veneers in a rich cherry finish capture and accentuate the ingenious elegant details. The stately headboard is adorned with large moldings and is slightly sleigh providing a lavish look for any bedroom. The footboard and rails do not lack detail, picture frame moldings and spindle legs complete this traditional design. Size is 78. 75-Inch wide by 94. 75-Inch deep by 53-inch high. Assembly required.
feature_bullets: Footboard and rails do not lack detail, picture frame moldings and spindle legs
Assembly required. Sleigh beds dimensions: 78. 75 W x 94. 75 D x 53 H
The Package Dimensions of the Product is 9.75" H x 13.25" L x 92.75" W

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
